briefTitle: Denosumab Fracture Intervention Randomized Placebo Controlled Trial in Japanese Patients With Osteoporosis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-controlled Phase 3 Study Evaluating Efficacy and Safety of Denosumab in Japanese Osteoporotic Subjects With Prevalent Fragility Vertebral Fracture(s)
summary: Evaluate the efficacy and safety of denosumab in the treatment of involutional (postmenopausal and senile) osteoporotic subjects with prevalent fragility vertebral fracture(s)

primaryOutcome.measure: Incidence of New or Worsening Vertebral Fractures in Osteoporotic Subjects Treated With Denosumab Compared to Placebo
